question: I am Diabetic Type 2 on Metformin and Hydrochlorothiazide for blood pressure. I have on occasion had fluttering and skipping in my heart beats and shortness of breath that comes on when my heardt acts up. (not neccesarily with exertion) It seems to happen along with pms type symptoms. Bloating, abdominal cramping, depression....and then slight spotting. I have had pelvic ultrasounds...normal, echocardiogram..normal.  What could be going on?I tend to have them at the first part of the month, sometimes monthly sometimes several months apart. I am 54 and have not had a period for 8 years now.  Some times it lasts for about an hour and sometimes it last for 3 to 4 hours and will be very painfull. Like very severe menstral cramps and coming on like contractions in labor. my blood pressure goes way up ..150/120 and I feel extremely tired and sweaty. Then it all just sort of goes away. Then I will have slight spotting.
title: Diabetes, Palpations, PMS like symptoms
